content.detailedDescription: Driving home around 6:45 pm i noticed 3 lights in the sky out of the front windshield. they were three lights straight across in a line. the object appeared to be hovering in the sky. it was a clear night and i could see the object very well and it did not appear to be far away. i live near willow grove air base and the training exercises are usually done directly near my house. the object was clearly not a plane and did not move like a helicopter. it was also not even in direct line of where the base would be. my first thought was, "this must be what people report as seeing a ufo." i turned the corner and was going to ask my husband to come look when i got home. i saw a neighbor and looked at him to see if he was looking toward the sky and noticed the object. he didn't. by the time i got home, i forgot to tell my husband. i remembered a few days later. have not seen anything like that since.
content.summary: 3 lights in a straight line hovering above in sky

content.detailedDescription: I live in baytown texas and tonight , 1-26-11, at 6:30 i was in the back yard with my dog. i looked up at the constellation orion and saw a very bright flash of extremely white light. it only lasted a split second and was located between the belt and the head of orion close to the center star in the belt. i have never seen anything like this and continued to watch for about 30 more minutes until my neck got sore. i did a google search on the internet and was amazed to see i was not the only one to see this. i am extremely curious as to what it was.
content.summary: Flash of light in constellation orion

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on the living room couch doing my home work, when suddenly i got this strange urge to look out the living room window. when i did i could see 3 bright greenish lights coming out of the south moving to the north as i watched them come closer to our house i grabbed my cell phone and got it ready to take a photo i waited till it was just over the tree rows close to the house and snapped the photo, i was going to take another photo but my phone mysteriously lost power and i couldn't get it to power back up. then all the lights in the house flickered on and off like we where going to lose power. i could now see this thing was moving right in front of our house and could now see it was a triangle craft with bright greenish glowing solid lights at each of the points of the triangle. i could also see a very faint florescent greenish line that looked lit coming from the front light going to the middle or center of the triangle and then it y'ed off to each of the rear lights on the triangle (kinda like a peace sign)i couldn't see any thing else it looked to be a dark black smooth surface on the bottom. this triangle seemed to just glide through the air i heard no sounds, i lost sight of it as it went over the house about a minute or 2 after that the lights stopped flicking i tried to power up my cell phone and it did work the battery level was 3/4 full totally freaked out and scared, i called my dad to tell him what happen and he calmed me down a little. i have seen satellites and many other aircraft at night while with my dad, and this was not none of those things. the photo i took is attached.
content.summary: Sitting at home doing my homework i got this strange urge to look out the window. when i did, i saw 3 bright lights in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to play basketball. while i was out there, i saw 2 very distinct lights that were there. they were brighter and a different color than all the stars around it. i'm a ufo fan, i watch a bunch of ufo shows and research ufo's, so i figured this was my first lucky moment. i go get my ipod 4g because it has an hd camera on it. it couldn't see the lights very well, and neither could my digital camera. so all i could do was sit there and watch. these lights were moving foward. as they moved up, they spread farther apart from each other. then they both got extremely bright, and shot up into space. the only thing left that i could see was a little cloud behind. and at least 5 minutes after they left, it got very wind, and it wasn't windy at all before that. if your wondering about the picture, since i couldn't take a picture, i just made one. i took a picture from the internet that looked like it. they were purple, and when they lit up, they turned a dark red. the white slashes are stars around it. sorry it was poorly made in like 5 minutes. if anyone has any questions e-mail me at *(email address deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: "stars" were moving up

content.detailedDescription: I was outside with my girlfriend having a cigarette and i noticed a strange dimmish orange light in the sky.  it didn't strobe like an airplane, it looked more like a flame flickering, the color is what caught my eye. you normally don't see aircraft with lights that dim and when you see airplanes the lights are horizontal, but this thing was vertical. i kept my eye on it because it did not look like your usual aircraft that flies around here.  the object was north of us traveling at medium speed west.  then it stopped and then it started to rise up into the sky at about a 35-40 degree angle and disappear rapidly into the night sky.  it didn't make any noise, totally silent.  i've never seen anything do that before, it totally looked like it flew up into outer space.
content.summary: Orange flame looking thing flys slowly and silently about 4-5 miles north of clearwater beach then flies into the sky and disappears rapidly.

content.detailedDescription:
I was headed west towards kansas city at dusk when i noticed a large black object in the sky (it would take a quarter to cover it at arm's length) approximately 2,000 feet above the downtown area.  at first i thought it was a helicopter, but it moved may times faster than a helicopter, about the same speed as fast as a fighter jet, except it did not stop at each point before moving in a different direction.  it was much larger than a helicopter - about the size of the stealth bomber. i attempted to get my cell phone ready to take a picture but was driving and was unable to do it.  i did not have my regular camera with me.  there were a couple of other traffic helicopters in the area and this looked nothing like them. this was an oval shape but with a flat bottom and was completely black with a dull finish, and no markings, lights, tail or wings.  as it moved back and forth, the shape never changed.  from my vantage point on a high hill, i could see a large area.  this object flew back and forth in a ziz-zag pattern very quickly several times at super fast speed, the went back (west) and forward towards me (east), then shot north at an extremely high speed and out of sight in a second.  i immediately called another field investigator who lives north of k.C. and he stopped his car and took several photographs of the sky east of his position. he saw a vapor trail at about 2,000 feet (see photo attached) but nothing else. 

note: i will close this report out since i am a mufon field investigator and it is in my area.
content.summary: Large black craft zooms over downtown kc then shoots north

content.detailedDescription: I was in lockwood valley in ventura county my gold diging budy got atack by a bear and is missing.Early that day. that night  it all started i was driving back and forth on lockwood valley rd.Till on my left theres a reaily big field dark green grass. it looked like 4 semi trucks 1030 at night driving along side me but there are no roads there.40 mile an hour my speed. then i looked two front trucks stared to get higher then the back two were as if they were going up a mountain.So i saw a mound of dirt on my left i turned my van sharp left turned on my brights there it was 30 feet of the ground right in front of me a ufo hovering right in front of me i jumped out of my van it was so un believable.The circle ship  had four groups of lights under it .As if the lights are on the 4 corner of a square two blue  to were you can see blue  all under nith it, two small orange lights and one red and blue mix with a hint of black. i felt it was the most passion it color,i felt it was used to tap in to the soul, and the mind.In my mind i felt as if theese beings are my family  my brothers in the sky.I went to a truck stop to hid to sho some one els then in my mind they wanted to know were ron was he did not show back at camp. i spent five month at that camp digging for gold ron always talk about the aleians and gold how he was connected two both, i felt in that time in my dreams they come to me. the law did not do anything about the bear attack earlier but these 7 ships will help me find ron so i drove almost 12 miles with these ships along side me when we got to were ron got attacked they flew over me saw them flying30 feet of the ground with blue light all over one ship stayed above me one ship to my right stayed with me till morining that night the influence they had on my sight it was as if i had lens on my eyes.About 4 in the morining they led me down a realy long driveway fience on both sides but the fience were sparking as i drove on through at the end of the driveway it looked about ten people standing there but there eyes were bigger than normal glowing blue i should have gotten out and talked but i was to overwelmed.I felt that if they want me i will park on the road
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.shape: Circle,   Cross,   Disc,   Sphere,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: There were 7 of them 1 really big the frist one i saw, they were on a serch and resqie mission same as me.Then they stayed with me for three days

content.detailedDescription:
It took place in 1977, at the time i was working as a teller at at bank.  it occurred in my parnet's home in monterey park, california.  monterey park is a city about eight or nine miles east of downtown los angels.

on the night of my experience the house was, has it usually is, quite and dark.  i laid awake in bed with my eyes open, thinking about things and waiting to bo back to sleep.  i'm sure i'd laid there for at least 30 minutes before my episode began.  here's what happened:

while laying there i was startled by a point of a white light that suddenly appeared in the hall.  it was passing in front of the bedroom door, moving very slowly.  my first thoughts were it was my dad with a flashlight.  i've known my dad to do repair work late at night, like a just discovered (to him) leaking faucet.  buy realizing my dad would just turn on a light, i suddenly found myself in terrible fear, thinking it was an intruder with a flashlight.  someone broke into the house!  being helpless in bed i thought the best thing to do was to lay still and watch.  but has my eyes adjusted to the light, i could see no one there; it was light floating in the air!

this light moved until it got halfway passed the door, and then it paused for a moment.  it then made a 90 degree tune and came into the bedroom.  moving very slowly, it traveled into the room a foot or so. it then made another 90 degree turn.  it moved of to my right.  although i was experiencing shear terror, i watchted it.  it appeared to be an orb about the same size diameter has a quarter.  it moved until it paused a second time.  when it moved again it made another turn at 90 degrees.  now it was moving parallel to my bed.  i watch with great terror and disbelief of what i was seeing.  my mind was racing with the thoughts of telling myself that i was indeed awake, and i assuring myself what i was seeing was really there.

this orb then traveled to a point that was even with the end of the bed.  i could still see it in the corner of my eyes.  here, the orb paused again and stood there for a few moments.  it then made another 90 degree turn and came toward me!  in a second or two, i sensed it was directly over my head.

terrified, i decided to jump out of bed and turn around to look at it.  but when i tried to do so i found out that i could not move!  i felt this enormous crushing force holding me down, as if the earth's gravitation pull increased ten fold over my bed.  i could feel my muscles were working, trying to obey my command to jump out of bed, but i could not move!  with this force pushing down on me, i had trouble inflating my lungs.  i could only take in small gasp of air.  has the seconds passed, i became aware of a pain growing in my stomach.  it felf much like muscle ache as if i was trying to do hundreds of sit-ups.  i don't remember seeing anything when this was going on, my eyes must have been closed.  this seizing force seemed like it lasted for about one to two minuets. what stands out in my memory was how hard i was pushing my arms down on the bed to try to lift myself up, the growing pain in my stomach and the gasping for air.  i was in a panic for air. 

as i struggled to get away i could rememer having the thought i was very close to breaking free.  with what enerby i had left i tried even harder to excape.  then all of a sudden i jolted up, to a "sit-up" position, believing i over came the force that was holding me down (or "it" let go).  when this happed i must have open my eyes because i clearly and distinctly remember getting a glimpse of the orb shooting out of the bedroom with great speed.  it traveled directly over my body and headed for the bedroom door.  once in was in the hall it made a 90 degree turn without stopping and disappeared out of view.  it was gone in an instant.

once the orb was gone, i laid back into the bed.  i remember thinking: "what ever it was, it's gone now and i could go back to sleep"  i quickly fell asleep.  looking back at this behavior, it seems ver odd.

what felt like a few minuets later i awoke at the usual time.  everything seem to be so normal.  the sun was shining throught the window and i could hear my mom and dad talking in the kitchen.  i sould smell coffee.  the first thing i thought of was the orb that came into the bedroom.  i wonder about it for a moment till i realized something very odd about myself, something i never experience before or since; under the blankets, i was soaked wet with perspiration!  pulling the blankets off, i examined my t-shiret and pajamas, they were sticking to me in some places.  when i got out of bed i felt the cooling effect it had on me.  i went to take my morning shower.  while taking off my clothes i was very astonished of how sweating i was.  my t-shirt and pajamas came off with a peel.

after the shower, i got dressed for work and went into the kitchen for coffee.  i then went into the living room.  there, my mom was drinking coffee.  i sat across the room from her.  still thinking about the orb, i almost came out and told her about the experience.  but for some reason, i'd stopped.  it would be years before i would have told anyone.

today i believe an orb did come into the bedroom and i was held down by some force.  but what happened when this was going on?  it dawned on me later that my body probably did not produce that much perspiration wetness in bed in two minutes.  so was there missing time?  was i told to keep my eyes closed?  did they tell me to "go back to sleep?"  was i told not to tell anyone?

i wonder about the orb.  did it know i was awake when it entered the room?  it seeemed to cautiously go round me.  did it pause to see my response to its presents and then proceed after i had no reaction?  the memory of seeing the orb shoot out of the room immediately after i "jolted up" makes me wonder too.  did it try to get out of the room before i saw it or did i suddenly startle and frighten it after i sat up in bed?  it seems to have taken off in a panic.

when this encounter was taking place it was certainly terrify, i hope it never happens again.  ever since, however, till today, i never look back at this experience with fear or dread, but with curiosity and wonderment.  i could also add a feeling of nonchalance.  i always thought of it as if it was no big deal, not workth memtioning.  after reading about other people's experience, however, i now feel it was quite extraordinary event.  it has been about 33 years or so now, and my life has been totally uneventful as far as orbs or ufo's are concern.  not a peep, unless they did a return visit while i was sleeping.
content.summary: A small orb, about the size of a quarter enters bedroom.

content.detailedDescription: Call me. this was too weird and disturbing and the hour is late.
content.summary: As usual, a couple objects rise out of the woods and fly around the top of our local mountain.

content.detailedDescription: I was at my home and i went to close the sliding glass door that leads to my backyard.  i noticed two glowing balls of light, pretty decent size for how far away they were, southwest of my location.  i went outside to get a better look and then another glowing ball appeared and then a fourth one appeared.  they were grouped together in pairs.  they would stay illuminated for about ten minutes and then fade away.  they did this cycle about three times until they disappeared and did not appear again.  they never seemed to move which is why i did not believe that they were flares even though they faded out like a flare would seem to do.  the objects seemed to be about 20 - 30 miles away but were about 2 - 3 times the size of airplane lights.  i felt a little strange because i have been out in my backyard at night many times to star gaze and ive seen numerous flying aircraft because we are in the flight path for the phoenix airport but this was nothing like anything i have seen before.  i was hoping for a little more clearer view though because they seemed so far away.
content.summary: I saw one to four glowing balls of light in the distant sky.  each one disappeared and reappeared over 30 minutes

content.detailedDescription: Mr. *(wit's name deleted--cms/sg) was heading west bound on west center street and approaching 69th street, approximately at 6:30 pm in omaha, nebraska, just getting dark when he first notice the lights directly south of him (to his left).  the craft was triangular in shape, with three white lights on the corners and a consistant strobing red light in the center.  the craft was approximately, three to four blocks away, 500 ft off the ground, heading due east at an approximate and constant slow speed, estimated at 20 mph. *(wit's name deleted--cms/sg) stated that he had to look back/forth to the craft while driving, heading to border's book store that evening. the craft had multiple colored lights above the craft.. green, blue, orange and red. the craft then move to a sse direction, more so to offutt afb before he lost sight of the craft due to driving situation. during the time the craft was moving in the sse direction, the front white light faded out over time, while all other lights remained their original brighteness. *(wit's name deleted--cms/sg) stated that he heard no noise and there seem to be little or no other traffic/cars during his observation. *(wit's name deleted--cms/sg) felt an euphoric feeling during and after the sighting and even so after two weeks.  he stated that he became nauseated for some time after several weeks after his sighting.
content.summary: See narrative.

content.detailedDescription: Me and several friends attend the festivities at whiskey island in cleveland ohio pretty much every year on july 4th...As the day time activities drew to an end...A few hundred people in attendance started to get situated for the evenings fire works display.  a friend of mine pointed up to the sky and i saw a orange object that looked like a flame of a lighter, horizontal to the ground traveling east at what appeared to be an amazing rate of speed, at a very high altitude.  weather conditions were very clear, aside from a few white clouds in the sky.  several people took notice and talked briefly about it.  i would like to say that i am positive that it was not a firework, a chinese lantern...Just for the record.  as the object flew over head, it looked like it was headed higher and higher...But not flying straight up...More like how a plane increases altitude.  after it passed everyone kind of was just quite.  kind of like "sh*t" that was neat, weird, or "cool".  all of us as a group even discussed the craziness of reporting a ufo sighting on july 4th!  once the fireworks ended everyone started to make their way to their cars, only to wait in traffic for 45 minutes.  my friend that originally spotted the orange ufo had gotten out of the traffic about 15 minutes before i did, called me and said he saw "it" again headed in the same direction...I however was unable to see it.  about ten minutes after that brief conversation, my girlfriend noticed "it" flying at what looked like the same altitude, but this time south west of where we are.  i would like to note that i am award of many colorful things in the sky on july 4th and that i am very very well aware of the one major and one small airport in cleveland...This, however was something different, and i feel very fortunate to be able to say i saw it!!!
content.summary: Right before fireworks and july 4th at whiskey island in cleveland ohio

content.detailedDescription:
Outside with husband on the porch. my husbands eyes look out to the horizon. he says what the.....!!!I turn around to see just above the tree tops far away facing south what appear to be three separate red lights hovering far in the distance. each light appeared about the same size as a large star.  if you can imagine  .   .   .   these dots represent the exact formation of these 3 bright red lights, never in my life had i see such a thing. it stayed motionless for a few minutes. no sound. i grabbed my binoculars. looking in them we couldn't see anything but lights, no shape observed. then they appeared to move perfectly aligned but tilted up on the left moving toward southwest direction slowly moving away in the distance. 
if you were to hold your arm outstretched and closed your fist, that would be about how wide the entire 3 lights were. 
i love to star watch and pay attention to air traffic and patterns. this in no way shape or form looked like an airplane or star. the way they/it moved together looked exactly like a formation or one very mothership large craft. both my husband and i are x military and agreed that they were not jet exhausts or trails. my star charts confirm no planets or stars at those degrees at that time. my thoughts and feelings.....Wow, i was scared and excited at the same time. my husband was more curious than anything. he is a long time skeptic but i think this stumped him.
content.summary: Three bright red lights in a row  motionless for minutes

content.detailedDescription:
a ufo the size of a beer bottle from 1 foot away from my face was the size of it from 3 stories above me at  3 miles. it was saucer shaped, and had an american flag on it. a friend of mine who works near oak ridge air force pace didn't confirm or deny, but said it wasn't out of the realm of possibility.

the location was in between oak ridge and cook ville when i was around 7 years old.

 ar first i thought it was indeed an airplane. except an airplane wouldn't be saucer shaped. and the few experiments that were done, couldn't get more than 5 feet in the air. however this was about three stories.

 it was flying straight, however very slowly.

 i had another sighting a few years later, but this one seemed more unusual.

 for many years after the sighting, i experienced nightmares about being chased by alien creatures.

 i lost sight of it after turning away after 30 seconds.

 what was particularly bizarre, was that nowone else seemed to see it, so i was hesitant for many years, cause i don't want to seem crazy.
content.summary: A ufo the size of a beer bottle from 1 foot away from my face was the size of it from 3 stories above me at  3 miles.

content.detailedDescription: They were on their way to pay some bills when her daughter seen something mysterious in the. sky she then told her mom and grandad,they all seen this object and will testifiy on it,the. object then hovering approximately about a hundred feet with bright lights disappeared,it was day time every one seen it.
content.summary: My name is *(wit's name deleted--cms/sg) my girl friend,daughter,and father seen an unidentified object

content.detailedDescription:
Went for a smoke outside and caught this strange light in the sky....
thought it was a shooting star....But then saw 2 more lights come out made a triangle shape and then it got dimmer and vanished away
content.summary: No sound strange color

content.detailedDescription: Evening time around 8pm; i was leaving home to go to band practice. outside home in rural residential area all of the neighborhood dogs were barking. i realized i was hearing a fairly loud metallic scraping and ripping sound; very high pitched coming from the top of the closest hill. i could not see anythin, but the sound persisted for approx. 30-45 seconds. at times the sound reached high pitch range close to a siren. it was very unidentifiable, eiry, and definitely bothering the dogs. when it stopped it was suddenly very quiet. i thought it was strange, but none the less got in my car, left my home, and began driving on a local hwy towards town ~40mph. within five minutes of leaving home i saw a slow moving triangular shaped craft with three bluish white lights located on each of the apex points flying at tree top level across the highway. i appeared to moving very smoothly, almost gliding across the valley. the area in which it was seen is a commercial strip with multi-story residential buildings and fairly populated with college students. i was completely enthralled by the ufo, and began to track its movement. i followed it and ended up driving into a hayfield off the highway, stopped my car and got out. i watched it go behind a stand a tress near to the multi story housing area. it was probably 300' away from me when it began to disappear. it was completely silent and appeared to surveying the area. it was on a straight line trajectory flying perpendicular to the ground. it was not a helicopter because it would have made a loud noise; it was absolutely silent. i got back in my car, started it up and began to pull around back towards the highway when a light lit up my car from above. it was not a bright white spotlight one would expect from helicopters. it was a soft light and it encompassed my vehicle for approximately 3-5 seconds. i stopped again got out and saw nothing. i feel as if i had been scanned by this light beam. not sure why, but i do believe this to be the case. later that evening i played the best music i have ever been able to play amazing my fellow musicians. perhaps, the light interacted with my energic field and was able to raise my aural energies?
content.summary: Brief encounter at close range

content.detailedDescription: I was outside with my ex - girlfriend when she pointed out that there were about 50 spheres or red balls flying in the sky . i couldn't tell if they were moving , but they were there , and haven't seen them since and have never seen them before . it blew my mind , i didnt know what to think , because i , myself research ufo's and am very interested in ufology . anyone have advice ? is this a colony ? i have never seen red sphere ufo's in my entire life , it was an amazing experience . it was very weird because about a month prior to that , in september , my girlfriend , her sister , and i . all saw what we thought to be a satelite because we were trying to telepathically communicate to them by staring at the sky . we thought it was a satelite at first , but there is no way a satelite can just snap and take off in a milisecond , and no not a shooting star . i was later driving from my girlfriend's back to my house that night and saw the same , maybe even more but around 50 - 100 orange or red ufo's flying really fast across the delaware / pa border .
content.summary: Fifty or so red spheres in the sky above pa

content.detailedDescription:
I lived in maui for 6-7 years. at the time of this occurence i was in napili hi.  napili is located on the west side of maui, about 8 miles past lahaina. i was on the beach having a smoke, looking west towards the island of lanai. it was dark at the time.
 i noticed it right away! it was brighter and lower than any star.  it looked barely over the island of lanai. it wasn't moving though, it also changed hues from red to green to silver back to red or green etc.
 i didn't know what it was.  i asked a newlywed couple to take a look at it. it didn't move and it didn't look like a star or plane.
 here's what happened.... it stayed stationary for about 20-30 minz, consistently changing hues, low in the horizon.  when it left was the interesting part. it went from completely still to dropping in the horizon at a sw movement. (sw meaning looking at it. it moved down and to the right in a straight line) way to fast for a plane! then it stopped on a dime and zoomed upwards with an arc. it left a tail as it vanished almost instantly.  i was curious if anyone else had seen this, the newlywed couple was from florida, it was at their condo. they saw it too.
content.summary: Ufo in the western sky

content.detailedDescription: My husband went outside & saw the lights then went inside & got the camera & was able to get a short video before it just disapeared. we live on top of a hill in the hill country. the nights are always bright & you can see galaxy clusters & trillions of stars, this night was unusualy dark. we also have milatary jets that fly over us frequently. i would love to get an explaination of this if you can. thank you for your time
content.summary: Rapidly moving lights

content.detailedDescription:
*(link moved to additional evidence section -- cms/sg).


this news are in spanish , please traslate and check it out...And search

this could be an ovni 

something extrange is happening in santander colombia
content.summary: Notice of ovni sight in colombia

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 2305 hours on 01/23/2011,in la porte, texas. i was walking my dog when i heard a strange humming sound. when i looked up i saw a black flying object, shaped like a teardrop but with angular wing like protrusions pointing backwards. three(3)very bright orange lights were facing forward. two(2)of the lights were on each side of the craft facing forward and one(1)orange light was in the middle or nose area of the craft. the craft made a sound that was like high current electricity, a loud humming sound. the craft's sound was like no sound that i have ever heard before from a man made flying machine.

when i saw the craft, i was transfixed by the very bright orange lights. at no time was i scared or did i feel threatened in any way.

the craft was traveling north at approximately 500' above the tops of the houses. the forward velocity seemed to be approximately 60 mph.The craft was traveling in a straight orientation. i saw this flying craft for approximately three(3) minutes. i lost sight of the object after it passed overhead and continued north. i could hear the low humming sound longer than i could see the flying craft. 
c
i have not seen this flying craft since this initial sighting.
content.summary: Black flying object approx 500' above houses travelling north

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was south-west of comanche, oklahoma. i was going home after my 8th grade middle school choir concert.

2. i was looking outside the car window, and i saw it.

3. i thought it was a meteor.

4. it was a large green orb. it was about 2x the size of what the sun looks like from earth. it had a green/yellow aura around it as it flew across the sky.

5. i was struck in awe when i first saw it. 

6. the object quickly shot over my car and into the distance of the southern part of the night sky.
content.summary: It was a large green orb with a green aura.

content.detailedDescription:
On january 22th. 2011 between 10 to 12 am. on the town of constanza in the center of country, i took a two consecutive photos (with a nikon d80 camera 200 mm. lens) of my wife and son standing on balcony of a house in the mountain looking toward the valley, in the first photo appear an object far away in the sky (at left in the photo) with a classic ufo shape, in the second photo just one or two second apart the object is not present; note that the light and shadows of the objects and persons are the same.

i would like to know your impresions about these photos after being analized by your experts.

thanks
content.summary: Appear casually on a family photo

content.detailedDescription:
I was out in the back yard of my house around 1:30 pm with my camera because i heard a little voice tell me they would reveil themselves to me..! at 12:00 this was after i prayed for the truth to be made known the day before. it was'nt the time of day they where talking about it was 12 o'clock in the sky, stait up thier it was a shinny white orb a very bright light came from the middle of the orb, i began filming and taking pictures
as it hoverd and slowly moved spinning and agitating in a horse shoe shaped patern it vanished 10 min. i took 30 or so pics in two days the second day i did not see any orbs in the sky, even with the zoom up to the max. but when i blow the photos up, changing the lighting with another software, i dicoverd they where there! waiting in the sky . i have the pictures to show you. blowning them up i have found 4 crafts in hidding....!Above my town ? blow these up and seach you may find another one lrt me know what you find your friend [name removed -cms/dr].
content.shape: Oval,   Sphere,   Square,   Rectagular,   Triangle,   Other
content.summary: Light orbs found hidding in inner space.

content.detailedDescription:
Today i left my house to take our son to school at hardin valley elementary in knoxville tennessee. after i turned right off lovell road to hardin valley road, i noticed something i thought was  a helicopter going parallel to hardin valley road. it was traveling slightly faster than traffic which was flowing about 45 mph since i could not keep up. i noticed right after i turned (about where the shell rocky top gas station is at and the new mc donalds. it was on the right of the cars and following the traffic. there was a whole file of cars in front of me and they were slowing down to look. i could not stop since the traffic was heavy and it is a 2 lane road. i had my camera in my hand since i never leave home without it. here is where i am trying to describe the object to the best of my ability. it was triangular. it passed me and the underside looked like a typical plane shape from underneath but it was dark.  the only thing with that is it was hovering> i know planes can't fly so low next to traffic by power lines and just hover, they fly . i noticed lights blinking: red, blue, white on the tips and underneath. the lights were a lot brighter than helicopter lights, like those super bright led lights they have now, except a thousand of those put together.The lights blinked in a similar pattern as those of a plane: 1-2, 1-2, 1-2-3 and repeat but the intervals were uneven. 

as i pulled in to the drop off line at the school, i made a right off hardin valley and was able to grab my camera and start it up. at this time the object was over the food city grocery store by the school and hovering over the parking lot. it was triangular, blinking and hovering. i could not see or hear chopper blades. the lights were too bright when they blinked to make out anything on the craft.. it was moving back and forth, not like a plane but like a fast helicopter, fluidly. it then zoomed off to the mountain ridge right by cambpell station road and beyond. i followed it with my eyes and it was a the top of a mountain just hovering. then i lost it with my eyes. 
i had to cut the camera off when i dropped off my son and then i lost the flying craft by the time i pulled out onto the main street.

i downloaded the video and since it was night, i was disapointed to see that all it showed was lights and not the triangle shape that i saw. it was still partly dark out at 7:20 am and my camera is not super. what i saw was way more than was the movie shows. i think i messed up by zooming in.

the bottom line is: i have seen lots of helicopters and when they search, they have their spotlights on. this is the only reason a chopper would be in a residential area. it certainly would not fly as low as power lines and street lights, when school is in.

i called the knox county dispatch and asked if there might have been a call in the area for a knox county sheriff helicopter to be dispatched to a call. she asked me to hold on as she was checking on the calls from 7 am to 7 :30 in the hardin valley area and hardin valley school area. she came back on the phone and told me that no, they were not called for emergency or anything else.

i then asked her is the county helicopters got brighter lights. she said not, the only time the lights are bright is when the spotlight is on. she said they would not do training in that area at that time of day. they don't usually go there to train anyhow. she said she will look into if a private citizen has a helicopter and was flying it because he should not have been flying it that low and in that area. she asked for my phone number and told me if anything else arises she will call. i said so there were no helicopters there? she said to me: not ours.

there is not an airport in the area. the nearest one is maryville. the craft did not have the usual search light had it been searching for a suspect. i just wish the video had been taken when it was following the cars on the main road, i was staring at the craft and could have gotten a better shot of it (maybe). it is just so hard to film anything at night it seems.

the film is what i got on camera.
content.summary: While taking son to school triangle shaped object traveling besides traffic. looked like plane but behaved like helicopter, triangle shaped

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from the store and turned west towards my house. that is when i saw the 2 big orange balls of light. i knew immediately it wasn't a plane. i kept saying to myself what is that? i never in my life thought i would post here or see a real ufo. well it was 2 big orange balls of light, not like a craft. it wasn't a balloon as it was light. it wasn't being projected from the ground. they were huge solid lights, not blinking so it wasn't an airplane which those lights in the sky are small. these huge orange balls of light were like the size as if you saw a hot air balloon in the sky at a close distance. i had a camera in my purse but it had a dead battery. i kept trying to turn it on (cursing) because i wanted to take a good digital photo. my other phone i had left at work which would of been a poor camera quality as its a cheapie free phone. i immediately called my sister's cellphone to tell her what i had seen but got her voicemail. i left a voicemail. the objects where 1 right below the other. verticle and just "floating" stationary in the air. that's the thing they weren't moving they just stood still for a few minutes and never pulsated, just solid orange globes. when the cloud cover went by, they were covered up and then they were gone. i had called my sister because she lives near by and i wanted her to go outside as she lives further north and might see them. its funny but i always watch movies where people stare at ufos and i think idiot run in case something might beam you up or get you but there i stood, just staring. i couldn't look away from it because i guess my mind was trying to process or figure out what it was. there have been some other reports earlier in this month in the same county of similar description. honestly i was excited when i pulled in the garage and went to jump out to continue looking at it but at the same time scared it could of been threatening. if i had to give you an area of where it was, over northeast coral springs, fl or by parkland, fl.
content.summary: 2 big orange balls of light

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard with my dog, while she was doing her thing i was staring at orion and other stars, i turned around with my head still staring at the sky and then out of the northwest portion of the sky about ten different lights moved across the sky toward the southeast. i had no idea what to think but i watch alot of ufo shows and this seemed very typical of this type of ufo, there were four dots a little gap then three more with three in a triangle formation behind the gap, none of them seemed to be stable, they would 'bounce' slightly. i lost sight after they flew over a large tree and the street light was too bright.
content.summary: A string of star like dots moving in formation.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on a lawn chair in the back yard. my husband was playing ball with the dog and the two children were on the trampoline. we had been out all morning since the sun was out. i take photos of nature and enjoy taking pictures of the clouds and the likes. i took several pictures this morning. when i saw this weird shaped clouds in the sky. i had never seen these forms in a clouds in nature. to sum it up, it looked like a spacecraft with windows on the side. it looked like it was invisible spacecraft in the clouds but somehow, passing through the sun and going through a cloud made it visible. 

i am a skeptic and really don't believe in this stuff but this was beyond belief. it looked like those crafts that people always talk about: flat, sphere like with windows on the sides that go all the way around the craft. this photo shows it as if it is just one side visible passing through but it looked like a circular craft. it passed very slowly in front of the sun and just moved along as a cloud would.

i felt freaked out and did not tell the family what i was seing.

i have heard stories of people saying ufo's have an invisible shield and that is why they hide in the clouds and we can't ever seen them. i don't know but these shapes were nothing a cloud has ever made before and i take lots of photos of clouds. 
best way to contact me is by email.
content.summary: Saw clouds that looked like a ufo was hidden in it, like it was invisible

content.detailedDescription:
This is an addition to an earlier report that i posted in regards to what i witnessed back on march 2, 2007 on highway 90 near boutte, la. please search the data base here under the date march 2, 2007 for more information about this case. (louisiana) 
 
tonight i watched the movie phoenix lights and i discoverd something that 
shocked me. i noticed that the large ufo's that were witnessed there by 
thousands of people have the same shape as the ufo(s) in the sky above the animal i captured the picture of in 2007. it is a large v shape and it looks exactly like what they describe and show in the movie. it gives me the chills when i think about it! this makes me believe that what i thought was 3 ufo's in the sky over the animal could be one large ufo like the ones over phoenix years ago. that means these particular aliens could be the same ones that flew over phoenix and areas of arizona years ago. 
 
i have studied the image of the car and animal many hours going back to 2007. i will add some more information that i have noticed by studying the images and include it in this post. 
 
the huge animal on the road that appears to be made up of numerous types of animals is bloated. bloating usually occurs many days after an animal is dead. highway 90 where i captured this image is a major road with traffic so there is no way possible that this animal could have sat there for days! it had to have been dropped or set there by these ufo(s). note the animal, glass, large pool of blood from animal, car, etc had all vanished when i went back to this area about 8 hours later! there is no way that the blood from the animal could have been cleaned up to show no stains on the highway 8 hours after the accident. 
 
also note that several faces appear on the animals body. when i witnessed this event it felt like time stood still and there was a quiet like i have never experienced before! there is also a circluar pattern near the animal that looks like something like a ufo might have landed on the highway. it also looks like part of the animal might have been sugically opened on parts of it's body by someone or something.  
 
the other image i captured that night is of a mustang car. it appears to be the vehicle that struck the animal. but like many people say the damage to it would be much greater if it actually struck this animal. there were two men on the scene that night but the police have no record of this occurring. i spoke with all police departments in that area including state police. i actually spoke with an officer that was patrolling the exact highway and time of occurence and he saw nothing. i believe they are all telling the truth. was the image of the police officer, the other well dressed man, and the car created to make it look like a car accident? could this be because the animal was accidently dropped from the alien craft? i really do not know but i do have my own beliefs about the representation of this event.  
 
the car from that night has an image of what looks like an alien on the side drivers door. i have a zoomed in image saved of this. i have studied this image and it is obvious that the alien is holding something in it's hand. it is blurry and hard to tell what it is. to me it looks like someone with blue clothes on and a blue cone shaped hat on their head. this person seems to be hugging a little girl. are they trying to send us a message with this image? but why? what does it mean? 
 
i am certain that this event was not from this earth! 100 percent certain!! this is why i want other's that are experts with photography, aliens, ufo's, etc to help me learn more about what occurred. i am just as curious about aliens, ufo's etc as many other people are! i know that what i captured is significant and unusual evidence that can help us to discover what we seek to know! 
 
i also know like most all of us know that the gov't is also very interested in learning more about aliens and ufo's. i believe they want to learn more about alien craft for air national defense advantages. i am all for national security i just wish they would give public disclosure and admit what they know. lately gov't vehicles have been watching me when i travel to the area of my vision from 2007. for those that don't know marked and un marked gov't vehicles are almost always either black or white in color with solid black tinted windows. i saw many of these vehicle here 2 weeks post katrina the largest disaster in u.S. history. 

 
i am including a new video i posted on youtube in this post here. this video is of the picture i captured of the animal form that night. it is lite up better so you can see more detail. i will also include the zoomed in image that looks like the alien is holding something in the air. this image appears on the drivers side door of the strange car. i will also include my facebook and youtube url for those that want to know more about my beliefs and info in regards to this event. i hope that together we can help to both prove that aliens exist and also learn from them and solve the mysteries we seek answers to! 

[links moved to additional evidence section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Unidentifiable animal and strange car with ufo's present
